cu.explanation_en: Setting the AMF IP to a loopback address (127.0.0.5) creates IP range conflicts, preventing proper network connectivity and AMF reachability.

du.explanation_en: Swapping Ta4 timing parameters to [180, 110] creates a logical contradiction where the upper bound is less than the lower bound, causing timing misalignment and front-haul synchronization failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 Ta4 時序參數交換為 [180, 110] 會建立邏輯矛盾，其中上限小於下限，導致時序錯位和前傳同步失敗。
